metadata.creator: nightech
metadata.description: this is nightech's second release on 2063music. ed sherbakoff lives and work in russia and developed an very own style in organising sounds. 2075 off is like the 'neku' ep a scapish, surrealistic trip through fragile, and stange sound structures. the music unfolds itself in a slow and silent way and leave much open room for the listener. musical elements seem to coexist in a jelly soundscape with microscopic view.
metadata.title: nightech - 2075off [63LP001]
metadata.subject: Ambient;Abstract;scape
